FuncDef:
The display device alarm hardware command displays hardware alarms on a device.
The display device alarm hardware history command displays historical hardware alarms. The display device alarm hardware command displays hardware alarms on a device. The display device alarm hardware history command displays historical hardware alarms.
CLIs: display device alarm hardware history { all | slot <slotid> } [ verbose ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a slot ID.
You can enter a question mark (?) and select a value based on the prompt.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display device alarm hardware history all verbose
ExtraInfo: You can run the display device alarm hardware command to view hardware alarms on the device. Historical hardware alarms refer to the hardware alarms that have been cleared in the system. You can run the display device alarm hardware history command to view historical hardware alarms of the current device.
